name: combine nodal data
desc: Combine nodal data from multiple input fields which share the same structure.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Model Components
properties.desc: The Model Components control allows the user to select which nodal data components to include, from the relative input field, in the output.
